slides.title: MyRoomie: Europe's Integrated Living Platform
slides.content:
Transforming Housing Through AI & Property Operations

Current Funding Round: 2M€ Seed Extension | Q4 2025
Total Funding Strategy: 30M€ across 5 rounds through 2030
Target Exit: 390M€ valuation by 2032

slides.title: The European Housing Crisis
slides.content:
27% of EU renters spend >40% of income on housing

• 9.6M housing unit shortage across Europe creating unprecedented demand
• 48% house price increase over 15 years with stagnating wages
• 38% of young professionals cannot afford independent living arrangements
• Fragmented market with poor matching solutions and no quality standards

The Problem: Traditional platforms are pure marketplaces with no control over supply quality or user experience.

slides.title: Our Revolutionary Solution
slides.content:
The only platform controlling both supply AND demand

Three Integrated Revenue Streams:
1. MyRoomie Connect - AI-powered flatmate matching with 75% success rate
2. MyRoomie Spaces - Branded property operations ("MyRoomie Homes")
3. MyRoomie Enterprise - Corporate housing services for BPO companies

Creating network effects impossible for pure marketplace competitors

Strategic Advantage: Each pillar strengthens the others - Enterprise provides stability, Spaces ensures quality supply, Connect drives user acquisition.

slides.title: Proven Traction & Strategic Pivot (August 2025)
slides.content:
Current Foundation:
• 15.775 active users maintained through strategic pivot transition
• 50K€ 2025 revenue (pivot year with platform reconstruction)
• 420K€ pre-pivot validation demonstrates strong product-market fit
• 246 properties under management with 11 real estate partnerships
• Major BPO partnership validated for 5.000-8.000 annual relocations

slides.title: Market Size & Revenue Projections
slides.content:
Total Addressable Market: 42B€ European rental market

Revenue Projections:
2026: 2.1M€ | 2027: 6.5M€ | 2028: 16M€ | 2029: 42M€ | 2030: 78M€ | 2031: 110M€

Path to 390M€ valuation by 2032 through systematic European expansion

slides.title: Funding Strategy & Use of Funds
slides.content:
Current Round: 2M€ Seed Extension (Q4 2025)

Total 5-Round Strategy through 2030: 30M€

Use of Funds:
• Product Development & AI Enhancement: 40%
• Market Expansion (Germany, Netherlands): 30%
• Team Growth (20 → 45 employees): 20%
• Marketing & Customer Acquisition: 10%

slides.title: Competitive Advantage
slides.content:
Unique positioning as the only integrated platform:

• Traditional competitors: Pure marketplaces with no supply control
• MyRoomie advantage: Vertical integration creates defensible moats
• AI-powered matching with 75% success rate vs. 15-25% industry average
• Branded property operations ensure quality and user experience
• Enterprise partnerships provide stable revenue foundation

slides.title: The Ask & Vision
slides.content:
Investment Ask: 2M€ Seed Extension

Target Exit: 390M€ valuation by 2032

2025-2030 Milestones:
• Achieve market leadership in Czech Republic
• Expand to Germany and Netherlands
• Scale to 580.000 active users by 2031
• Build Europe's premier integrated living platform

Join us in transforming European housing through technology and integrated operations.
